title: Tempero e Saude
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, International, Buffet, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Tempero e Saúde is one of few veggie friendly restaurants in town. The buffet includes vegetarian options, including pies, lasagna, brown rice, and salads. Has a few vegan salad options, and the owner will make a vegan hot dish upon advanced request.
